file_content.text: Don't worry about me. I can hold this area until reinforcements arrive.
The Republic soldiers that killed your squad are no longer a threat.
I've called headquarters for reinforcements. Next squad should be here soon to hold the place, but we couldn't have secured it without you.
Can't thank you enough. Payback is satisfying.
Teach those adrenal-chugging Republic scum a lesson.
My lord. Sergeant Molvar. Had a cousin who was Sith. Very powerful. Died young. Wish he was here now.
Hunter. A sergeant's operating budget isn't befitting a duchess or anything, but I'll pay you good to make some Republic dead.
Agent, sir! Sergeant Molvar reporting. I can't candy-coat this one. Nothing's going to make this op taste any better, except maybe Republic blood.
Sir, your help is critical.
Operation was to move in, secure the area for a supply depot, move troops and equipment deeper into the mines.
Casualties: Thirteen. Dead: Twelve. And I count six broken ribs, one shattered kneecap and one Hutt-sized headache.
What happened here?
I could just put you out of your misery right now.
Would you rather be dead?
Sure, after we take care of the Republic scum that wiped out my unit.
Why are you telling me this?
The Republic worms guarding the area were jacked up on some kind of adrenals. They weren't human. They were animals.
They shrugged off blaster fire like bug bites and then tore into my squad. I only survived because a grenade knocked me senseless.
My plan was to rush in there, take all the adrenals I could find, and complete the mission, but you might have better success. We need that supply depot.
I'll handle it.
Sure. Won't do the rest of my squad any good, but I'll take a lesson.
From the way you describe these Republic soldiers, I'm not sure I'd do any better.
This sounds dangerous.
The Republic soldiers are only good because they have an edge.
I'll give you the coordinates to the Republic's adrenal stashes. If they can play that game, so can the Empire.
Secure the area for the new supply depot and make sure Alpha Squad didn't die for nothing.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
All right, then. Back to Plan A. At the very least, the adrenals should help me get rid of this headache.
The Republic's going to pay. Soon as the ringing in my ears stops.
